meaningMnemonic: Because the hiragana ends with an う sound, you know this word is a verb. The kanji itself means <kanji>forge</kanji> and the verb vocab version is <vocabulary>to forge</vocabulary> and <vocabulary>to temper</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: <vocabulary>To forge</vocabulary> something, you need to have your <reading>kit</reading> (きた) with you. Without it, you won't be doing any forging at all.
